topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: Create a New Manual Build

body.p: This process selects an available source commit and builds it.

ol.li: Click the Builds tab and then click New Build.
Select the target project from the dropdown list.
Select the commit to build and then click Launch Build.

body.p: When the build has completed, if the Results value is Success, click View to view the deployed application.
